name: com.unity.services.wire
description: Wire provides notifications in real-time for Unity Gaming Services subscribing to a particular service and listening for messages from that subscription through a websocket connection.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
* fixed a bug in the ping protocol
* fixed an issue preventing the package to work with Nintendo Switch
* fixed vulnerabilities in the Websocket library
### Changed
* Excluded WebGL and Switch platforms from the websocket-sharp target
